template.name: Restaurant Reservations For The Travel Trade

input.name: name
input.title: Enter the name of the Restaurant (If you have multiple outlets include a landmark in the name Eg. Pizza Express - Abeville Road)

input.name: street
input.title: Address 1

input.name: street2
input.title: Address 2

select.name: cont_name
select.title: Select contacts who should receive communications pertaining to bookings made on the site. If you choose more than one contact, the email will be sent to all selected contacts

input.name: city
input.title: Enter your city

input.name: zip
input.title: Enter the post code

select.name: inv_cont_name
select.title: Select contacts who should receive invoices of bookings made on the site. If you choose more than one contact, the email will be sent to all selected contacts

input.name: active
input.title: If not selected, Restaurant will not be shown in Search

input.name: menu_sc
input.title: Enter Service Charge %

div.title: Use this menu to add details about your Restaurant

div.t-att-title: 'This tab allows you to define timings for each day and type of meal. You can set Premium, Standard & Non-Premium timings for Breakfast, Lunch, Dinner & Afternoon Tea' if not user.is_group else 'Opening Hours'

div.title: Use this tab to add the menu details of your restaurant
Click to add Images of your restaurant. These will be shown to tour operators on search results. You may add upto 5 images
Click to add dates & time during which the pricing/allocation entered previously will not be applicable. Tour operators will not be able to make bookings against your restaurant on such date/time

div.span: Note: Latitude / Longitude co-ordinates are crucial for your restaurants to show up on search results. They will be populated based on the address/post code entered above. To manually add the co-ordinates, please use tooltip on the Latitude & Longitude fields for instructions.

textarea.name: descp_venue
textarea.title: Describe your restaurant in about 100 words. This information will be shown to the tour operators on the search results and detailed restaurant pages

textarea.t-att-title: 'Provide directions to reach the restaurant. Please provide information about various modes of transportation available' if not user.is_group else 'Outstanding Features'

select.name: Dining
select.title: Select a Dining Style. Tour operators will be able to filter their search based on the dining style

select.name: Cuisine
select.title: Select Cuisine. Tour operators will be able to filter their search based on the cuisine

input.name: latitude
input.title: Enter the Google Maps latitude for the restaurant. Follow the below steps to retrieve the co-ordinates. 1. Visit http://maps.google.com 2. Search for your restaurant by entering the name in the search-box provided 3. If you had previously mapped your restaurant on Google Maps, the same will show up 4. Right click on the location pointer icon and click ‘What’s here?’ 5. You will see the latitude and longitude populated in the search-box 6. Copy and add the values in the FIT For Purpose system 7. In case you have not previously mapped your restaurant on Google Maps, search for the nearest landmark and repeat the steps 4 to 6

input.name: longitude
input.title: Enter the Google Maps longitude for the restaurant. Follow the below steps to retrieve the co-ordinates. 1. Visit http://maps.google.com 2. Search for your restaurant by entering the name in the search-box provided 3. If you had previously mapped your restaurant on Google Maps, the same will show up 4. Right click on the location pointer icon and click ‘What’s here?’ 5. You will see the latitude and longitude populated in the search-box 6. Copy and add the values in the FIT For Purpose system 7. In case you have not previously mapped your restaurant on Google Maps, search for the nearest landmark and repeat the steps 4 to 6

input.name: payment_opt
input.title: Enter all payment options that you provide to guests in your Restaurant. Eg: Cash, Credit Card, Debit Card etc.

label.t: Max No. Of Covers on a Table

input.t-att-title: 'Enter the size of the largest table that you will allocate to FIT FOR PURPOSE' if user.is_group else 'Total No. Of Covers(exclusive hire)'

input.name: dress_code
input.title: Enter dress code, if any

td.label: Min No. of hours before Booking

input.name: booking_hrs
input.title: Minimum number hours before which the guests can book a table

input.name: parking
input.title: Enter the details of parking facilities available

td.label: Min No. of hours before Cancellation

input.name: cancellation_hrs
input.title: Minimum number hours before which the guests can cancel the booking

input.name: main_covers
input.title: Enter the no. of main restaurants covers

input.name: room_covers
input.title: Enter the no. of room covers

input.name: semi_covers
input.title: Enter the Sep.Areas/Semi Private Covers

textarea.name: additnal_details
textarea.title: Please mention any important details not covered in the fields above

div.span: Your search string contains illegal characters.

template.name: Restaurant Reservations For The Travel Trade

input.name: name
input.title: Enter the name of the Restaurant (If you have multiple outlets include a landmark in the name Eg. Pizza Express - Abeville Road)

input.name: street
input.title: Address 1

input.name: street2
input.title: Address 2

select.t-att-disabled: None if partner.state_id.id or partner.country_id.name == 'United Kingdom' else 'disabled'
select.name: State
select.t-att-title: 'Select a County' if partner.state_id.id or partner.country_id.name == 'United Kingdom' else 'Please Select United Kingdom as country to choose a county'

select.name: cont_name
select.title: Select contacts who should receive communications pertaining to bookings made on the site. If you choose more than one contact, the email will be sent to all selected contacts

input.name: city
input.title: Enter your city

input.name: zip
input.title: Enter the post code

select.name: inv_cont_name
select.title: Select contacts who should receive invoices of bookings made on the site. If you choose more than one contact, the email will be sent to all selected contacts

input.name: active
input.title: If not selected, Restaurant will not be shown in Search

input.name: menu_sc
input.title: Enter Service Charge %

div.span: Your search string contains illegal characters.

div.title: Use this menu to add details about your Restaurant

div.t-att-title: 'This tab allows you to define timings for each day and type of meal. You can set Premium, Standard & Non-Premium timings for Breakfast, Lunch, Dinner & Afternoon Tea' if not user.is_group else 'Opening Hours'

div.title: Use this tab to add the menu details of your restaurant
Use this tab to add the drink details of your restaurant
Use this tab to add the event details of your restaurant
Click to add Images of your restaurant. These will be shown to tour operators on search results. You may add upto 5 images
Click to add dates & time during which the pricing/allocation entered previously will not be applicable. Tour operators will not be able to make bookings against your restaurant on such date/time

Max. Covers

input.title: Select the blackout date

select.title: Select start time of blackout. If you set the selection to N/A, the system will consider the entire day as a blackout day. If you enter a FROM and TO time, the blackout will be applicable only for the duration entered

Select end time of blackout. If you set the selection to N/A, the system will consider the entire day as a blackout day. If you enter a FROM and TO time, the blackout will be applicable only for the duration entered
